data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 152,500 citizens of Zacapa, Guatemala, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zacapa, Guatemala
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Zacapa, Guatemala find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 38,066 believers in the state of Zacapa.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Zacapa, Guatemala a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, for those in trouble in the state of Zacapa prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Zacapa, Guatemala.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 107,273 people in the state of Zacapa who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.
